data.system_settings: Windows 10. Latest Canary. Razer Kraken 7.1 Chroma
data.actual_result: Makes your ears bleed. (very very loud sound)
data.short_description: Razer Kraken 7.1 Chroma. Extrodenarly loud sound when clicking mic/deafen icon. https://trello.com/c/JTxcfhWb/194-razer-kraken-chroma-7-1-notification-sounds-randomly-spike-loudly-when-clicking-mic-deafen-icons
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel. - Open volume mixer - Increase discord's volume so it pushes device volume (or master volume) upward [see video if you are confused]. - Press Mic mute or deafen or disconnect and enjoy having your ears blown out.
